infotexts.entitydescription.printer: Used to print and deconstruct ID cards.
infotexts.entitydescription.wrenchbutton: Produces a signal when the mechanism is twisted with a wrench.
infotexts.entitydescription.carbonatespraybracket: Holds a carbonate spray to the wall.
infotexts.entitydescription.carbonatespray: A fire extinguisher can filled with an experimental carbonate that is poisonous to creatures, but safe to humans.
infotexts.entitydescription.midazolam: Strong drug with healing properties, but due to it's composition, it causes alcohol poisoning and unconciousness.
infotexts.entitydescription.goblincrate: Too small for even the most nimble of humans... but maybe a goblin could fit in there.
infotexts.entitydescription.goblinmask: A strange green mask that emanates a magical aura. What happens if it is put on?
infotexts.entitydescription.bodybag: A plastic bag used to put dead bodies in, or to torture someone by asphyxiation.
infotexts.entitydescription.wifiexplosive: A powerful remotely triggered plastic explosive. It can be triggered by, for example, a wifi signal.
infotexts.entitydescription.handheldtrigger: A device capable to send a wifi signal to a small distance away. The channel will be the same as the headset, but if there is no headset, then the channel will be set to 0.
infotexts.entitydescription.backpackradio: A hefty backpack-mounted portable radio transceiver used by officers for long range communication with their squad.
infotexts.entitydescription.pirateclothesofficer: It's exactly like a regular separatist outfit save for added light armor plating and an armband meant to distinguish the officers from the regular troopers.
infotexts.entitydescription.jetmask: Just a diving mask and a helmet welded together, a standard headgear for the Jovian Elite Troops, or JET. Just seeing one can often provoke profound fear into any Nexpharma personnel.
infotexts.entitydescription.jetmaskother: Just a diving mask and a helmet welded together, a standard headgear for the Jovian Elite Troops, or JET. Just seeing one can often provoke profound fear into any Nexpharma personnel.
infotexts.entitydescription.nexsuit: Nexpharma proprietary suit exclusive to their elite paramilitary group, the Mobile Emergency Rescue and Combat Squad, or MERCS. In actuality, it's just a PUCS adapted for combat.
infotexts.entitydescription.jetrevolver: An old but still common 12 gauge revolver.
infotexts.entitydescription.jetshotgun: A shotgun designed for close-quarters tactical operation.
infotexts.entitydescription.jetsmg: An old carbine that fires pistol rounds, the same kind Nexpharma weapons do.
infotexts.entitydescription.jetsmgcompact: A modified version of the carbine that sacrifices accuracy for portability.
infotexts.entitydescription.jetrifle: An autoloading slow firing drum mag .30 rifle, unknow manufacturer.
infotexts.entitydescription.jetlmg: An absurdly large automatic fire shotgun with insane fire power, although reloading is a bit cumbersome.
infotexts.entitydescription.mercspistol: A nexpharma proprietary portable and compact pistol which uses .45 cal.
infotexts.entitydescription.mercssmg: A nexpharma proprietary fast firing and low accuracy .45 cal SMG.
infotexts.entitydescription.mercssniper: A nexpharma proprietary portable .30 bolt-action rifle with a foldable barrel.
infotexts.entitydescription.mercsrifle: A nexpharma proprietary military carbine that uses assault rifle ammo.
infotexts.entitydescription.idcardjet: Terrorist militant. Admin tier 3 and weapons tier 3.
infotexts.entitydescription.idcardinmate: Terrorist civilian. Only useful for regular doors.
infotexts.entitydescription.idcardmercs: Nexpharma militant. Admin tier 3 and weapons tier 3.
infotexts.entitydescription.idcardenforcerguard: Nexpharma militant. Admin tier 1 and weapons tier 1.
infotexts.entitydescription.idcardeliteguard: Nexpharma militant. Admin tier 2 and weapons tier 2.
infotexts.jobdescription.monsterjob: Monsters are special powerful hostile creatures that are part of their own team, the Monster team, a team separate from the Nexpharma and Terrorist teams. The specific creature you will be depends on the gamemode that is being played! Monsters have a long range "monster chat" for planning (text only).
infotexts.jobdescription.mutatedmantisjob: Member of the Monsters team, kill all humans. You have 1800 vitality and slowly and passively regen, but can gain lots of HP by feasting on corpses. You attack each 1.5 seconds, dealing 45 blunt trauma and 5 bleeding. On land, you move slightly slower than a human, but on water, you're quick and nimble. You can open regular doors, use trams and rapidly break secure doors.
infotexts.jobdescription.mutatedcrawlerjob: Member of the Monsters team, kill all humans. You have 1200 vitality and passively regen, but can gain lots of HP by feasting on corpses. You attack each 1.5 seconds, dealing around 55 bite wounds and 15 bleeding. On land, you move as fast as a human, and on water, you're quick and nimble. You can open regular doors, use trams and slowly break secure doors.
infotexts.jobdescription.mutatedchimerajob: Member of the Monsters team, kill all humans. You have 1200 vitality and passively regen, but can gain lots of HP by feasting on corpses. You attack each 1.5 seconds, dealing around 55 bite wounds and 15 bleeding. On land, you move as fast as a human, and on water, you're quick and nimble. You can open regular doors, use trams and slowly break secure doors.
infotexts.jobdescription.greenskinjob: Member of the Monster team, kill all humans. You are a kind of amphibious nimble critter that like playing games with their prey. Put masks on living humans to turn them into goblins. Hide in goblin crates to regenerate.
infotexts.jobdescription.overseer: Civilian Member of the Nexpharma team, escape the facility and collaborate with the MERCS and Guards. High-level personnel equipped with a brought-from-home revolver and overseer keycard (Admin Tier 3).
infotexts.jobdescription.researcher: Civilian Member of the Nexpharma team, escape the facility and collaborate with the MERCS and Guards. A low-level researcher, equipped with your research and your staff keycard (Admin Tier 1).
infotexts.jobdescription.repairmen: Civilian Member of the Nexpharma team, escape the facility and collaborate with the MERCS and Guards. Basic maintenance personnel, equipped with maintancen supplies and your staff keycard (Admin Tier 1).
infotexts.jobdescription.inmate: Civilian Member of the Terrorist team, escape the facility and collaborate with the Terrorists. Subjucated, tested on and treated like scum - tonight we escape brothers! Equipped with some contraband.
infotexts.jobdescription.jet: Militant Member of the Terrorist team, kill monsters and nexpharma personnel, but help inmates escape. Jovian Elite Troops, give 'em hell! Equipped with heavy weaponry, medicine and a JET device (Admin Tier 3 and Weapon Tier 3).
infotexts.jobdescription.mercs: Militant Member of the Nexpharma team, kill monsters and terrorists, but help staff escape. Mobile Emergency Rescue and Combat Squad reporting for duty! Equipped with heavy weaponry, medicine and a MERCS keycard (Admin Tier 3 and Weapon Tier 3).
infotexts.jobdescription.eliteguard: Armed Member of the Nexpharma team, kill monsters and inmates, but help staff to escape. Senior security, mostly tasked with commanding the other guards, equipped with a pistol, body armor and an elite guard keycard (Admin Tier 2 and Weapon Tier 2).
infotexts.jobdescription.enforcerguard: Armed Member of the Nexpharma team, kill monsters and inmates, but help staff to escape. On-site security personnel only meant to keep the inmates in check, equipped with a PWD, body armor and an enforcer guard keycard (Admin Tier 1 and Weapon Tier 1).
infotexts.afflictiondescription.fatigue: Excessive exercetion. Slow down a bit to catch your breath.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.reloading: Hands temporarily being used for reloading.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.carbonatepoisoning: Oxygen diffusion in the blood is lowered, leading to slowness and light headedness.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.intoxicated: Noxious gases in the air tear through armor, skin and organs.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.justice: Lady justice is mad at you for being unsportsmanlike.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.huskstun: Husk neurotoxin present in the host's blood.
